storyInfo: Kristen looks up at the stars. Blake decides to take the plunge. The Rhodes Islanders are attacked. Silence decides to continue her pursuit. Ifrit looks at Saria's back, deep in thought.

attributes.content: These stars have twinkled above Terra since ancient times.
Just how many romantic myths and searching gazes do they hold?
Astrologers spend their lives assigning symbols to constellations and celestial bodies to give them meaning, while shamans and druids try to interpret the trails left by every passing meteor.
They are untouchable. Indeed, it is precisely because of this that the sky has become the true home of those who indulge in fantasy.
And for this great land, looking up holds no meaning.
6152.31 Meters. The height of Terra's sky.
attributes.name: Kristen

attributes.content: And also, the last record of the Wrights' final flight.
attributes.name: Kristen

attributes.content: No one has questioned this limit.
attributes.name: Kristen

attributes.content: Nobody is angry, confused, or curious about it.
attributes.name: Kristen

attributes.content: People live on this pea wrapped so softly in a its pod, and couldn't care any less.
attributes.name: Kristen

attributes.content: And thus, came the shabby poem from an Ursine poet centuries ago.
attributes.name: Nasti

attributes.content: 'Starpod'.
attributes.name: Kristen

attributes.content: Hmph. A romantic name for the barrier.
attributes.name: Nasti

attributes.content: I've read through every paper related to the subject of barriers, those sloppy theories formulated by Victorian and Leithanian scholars...
attributes.name: Nasti

attributes.content: 'Analysis on Pressure in Space,' 'Theory on Density Differentials between the Barrier and Outside Matter' ...Old, outdated, and full of holes.
attributes.name: Nasti

attributes.content: Those Columbian academics announcing their 'pioneer's spirit' merely tinker with that garbage. Then you get the occasional novel theory put out by younger scholars in academic journals.
attributes.name: Nasti

attributes.content: But they spend way more energy getting tenure and research grants than looking at the sky.
attributes.name: Nasti

attributes.content: Oh, by the way. The test platform we launched the other day has already fallen back to the ground, due to the same old problems with the barrier.
attributes.name: Nasti

attributes.content: The sudden change in basic aerodynamics, massive disruption to the Originium Zone, and the extremely rapid decay of any exogenous power.
attributes.name: Nasti

attributes.content: What about the results of the data analysis from the Transmitter?
attributes.name: Kristen

attributes.content: The batch from the re-adjusted ones are solid.
attributes.name: Nasti

attributes.content: I've also already laid out all the energy cables, and connected them to the port you mentioned previously.
attributes.name: Nasti

attributes.content: But, Kristen. You're well aware of just how much energy you'll need for this.
attributes.name: Nasti

attributes.content: The theory is sound, however...
attributes.name: Nasti

attributes.content: That won't be a problem.
attributes.name: Kristen

attributes.content: Alright.
attributes.name: Nasti

attributes.content: The test platform's crash landing has caused us some trouble, and the military is burning with anxiety over your disappearance.
attributes.name: Nasti

attributes.content: Kristen, whatever their next step may be, death might be the most merciful outcome.
attributes.name: Nasti

attributes.content: I wouldn't even consider that a price to pay at all.
attributes.name: Kristen

attributes.content: Nasti, do you like stargazing?
attributes.name: Kristen

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: Nasti

attributes.content: Staring at something out reach just makes me feel empty.
attributes.name: Nasti

attributes.content: And yet, sometimes the unreachable can become a signboard for you.
attributes.name: Kristen

attributes.content: You are indeed right on one thing.
attributes.name: Kristen

attributes.content: Death is only the most merciful outcome.
attributes.name: Kristen

attributes.content: Then I hope you don't die before giving me what you promised, Control.
attributes.name: Nasti

attributes.content: You should be more careful.
attributes.name: Nasti

attributes.content: Thank you, I will.
attributes.name: Kristen

attributes.content: Colonel? How am I supposed to take this order?
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Let me guess... the agent you sent to watch Kristen has gone MIA, and you've suppressed the news.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Your superiors aren't worried about your agents being silenced by Kristen, but rather, they might have signed on with her and betrayed the country.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: And they're probably even wondering, have you betrayed the country too?
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: It's no wonder you've been racing to find Kristen.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: My last tour was in Bolívar.
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: In the late forties, the coalition government backed by the DOD was bumbling around like toddlers in its own jurisdiction, and our intervention policy for the Bolívarian Civil War was deemed a failure.
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: The DOD's rep has fallen so low in the eyes of our people, the General even handed over control of the armed forces....
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: The DOD needs 'Arc-01' to restore its image and regain the trust of the people. And I also need it to prove myself worthy of plucking the General's medals out of the dust.
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: So yeah, it is my last chance.
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: But you can lay off the clownery for now, Ferdinand.
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: Come on, Colonel. Who are you even trying to fool with all that?
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: This isn't enough of a reason for the DOD to go so far. And definitely not enough to stake your life on it.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Hey, don't you always brag about being as smart as Kristen? Why not use that clever scientist brain of yours and figure it out?
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: It's not like you don't know a thing about Kristen. Surely you ran a thorough check on her before handing the project over.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: The situation is pretty bad, but there's definitely a contingency plan at work, your reactions have been abnormal anyway.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: If your people haven't gone crazy, then it only comes down to this...
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Kristen isn't the actual reason.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: No, she's just a fuse.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: Ferdinand suddenly looks up at Blake, his eyes full of astonishment.
He has come to a conclusion he can barely believe himself.
You didn't meet the Vice President to talk about Kristen... what you wanted was a mood.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: The Wrights were a pair of lunatics, squandering the nation's tax money on ridiculous notions like challenging the sky.
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: And all they gave back to the country was a little lunatic by the name of Kristen Wright.
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: Ferdinand, I respect men of your caliber.
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: Usually, it's your type disrespecting the nation.
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: Am I wrong? I can't imagine the 'meteor' that fell from the sky having any motive beyond an attempt to provoke us.
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: The most generous motive I can imagine is her selling the data to another country. She holds a weapon capable of seriously damaging a nomadic city. And the military handed it right to her.
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: Or the worst, she actually wants to avenge her parents.
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: She wants to point 'Arc-01' right at D.C., she plans to destroy the Columbia that, in her eyes, treated her parents so unfairly...
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: We've already seen enough to make people wonder if they were born in the wrong era.
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: Hell, the scarier thing is, doesn't Jackson know about all this? Don't those Maylander agents know too?
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: Guess how much he already knew about Kristen, me, and you before I even walked into his room?
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: But he still chose to put it off.
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: I won't sugarcoat it.
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: From the moment we lost Bolívar, the coalition government has spared no effort in suppressing the military.
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: Our current state of affairs is, to them, an excellent weapon.
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: It doesn't matter if Kristen is exacting revenge or betrayal, what's important is that this is a scandal for the DOD.
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: And the losses brought on by it seems to be an acceptable cost to them.
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: Do you want to be part of that cost, Ferdinand?
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: Do I even get to choose?
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: If you didn't figure it out just now, you might have.
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: So you can one, use your connection with me, and just wait till we've recovered 'Arc-01,' when the military will coincidentally be hiring a new scientific advisor...
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: Or two, die here with me, and be swept into the trashcan of history together.
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: Ferdinand stares at the soldier before him, confirming he's seen something in the man's eyes.
Whether pure banter or a real crisis... silence has connected the two.
...I get it, Colonel.
attributes.name: Ferdinand

attributes.content: The Vice President has already broadcast live to every citizen that Columbia is about to enter a new era.
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: But accidents are inevitable on the way to said era.
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: I believe he'll dedicate everything he has to realize this for Columbia.
attributes.name: Blake

attributes.content: So that's the situation over there near the Triton factory. The parts regarding Kristen are just my own guesswork.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: Judging by the military's response, that seems to hold enough water.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: A superweapon that the government hopes to use to re-assert power, or Kristen herself having other plans...
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Trimounts is indeed working on a secret mega project using energy at its core, with unimaginable destructive power, yet to be scientifically tested... and it's nearing completion.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: That's what I'm worried about as well.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: Saria, has there ever been a mass blackout in Trimounts?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Hmm? Never.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: Trimounts has separate power grids for residential and commercial use, and each of their power reserves alone is enough allow all the facilities in the entire city to operate normally for several months.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: Moreover, Trimounts has a booming technology industry, with dozens of companies dedicated to developing new forms of energy, and nearby mobile industrial platforms regularly borrow energy from the city.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: Kal'tsit looks out the window.
The skyscraper in the distance with its gigantic glass facade frames a billow of clouds, its surface crystal clear, like a leaf full of dewdrops.
Indeed, it is just a leaf.

Her gaze expands, and the building quickly disappears into a nest of countless skyscrapers: exhibitions on science and technology interspersed with expo halls, and other specialized buildings scattered around at random, like a bacterial colony in a forest.
But, as she raises her head, the vast sky dwarfs the city, and Trimounts is only a leaf.
No matter if it's a superweapon ordered by the military, or an unknown object that Kristen has other plans for...
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: The amount of energy and precision required for the 'Horizon Arc Project' is beyond the scope of our imaginations.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Energy consumption and navigation accuracy are issues they must solve.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: So you're implying...
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: I don't know how the Columbian military has assessed the situation, or how Kristen has pulled the wool over their eyes.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Even if she were able to solve the issue of precision, my judgement is that it cannot support energy concentration on such a scale, even if you use all of Trimounts's energy reserves.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Once you start such a huge project, it should drain Trimounts's energy in an extremely short span of time, like stuffing a giant sponge into a glass of water.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Even if Kristen's talents and vision are far beyond the present, the current state of science and technology should not be able to realize such a concept.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: But she is by no means a simple mad scientist indulging her delusions.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: Unless... she has already solved this problem.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: What the heck are they talking about?
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.options: Stop eavesdropping. The door's soundproofed.;Stop eavesdropping. They're going to find out.

attributes.content: It's gotta be about the factory that went kaboom, right? Saria looked kinda serious. Does this have something to do with Rhine?
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Doctor, is Silence in Trimounts, too? Can we bring her here?
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Doctor, why are you frowning like that?
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Oh, I get it. You still blame Kal'tsit for bringing Rosmontis and me here.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: We decided to come on our own. I've been here before. I can even be your tour guide!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.options: Rosmontis, you're looking at the letter again. Are you okay?

attributes.content: He invited me to come back here...
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: The Feline girl is still holding that thin envelope in her hands. Five minutes ago, she opened it and quietly read the letter again, before stuffing it back inside a minute ago.
She lifts her head up to look at you. There doesn't seem to be any particular emotion in her eyes, but you notice something unmistakable nonetheless...
She is trying to comfort herself, almost like she is trying to smooth out a small, wrinkled piece of paper under the school desk without attracting anyone's attention.
You can feel that she is confused, maybe even in pain.
I forgot again, Doctor.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: Can coming back here help me remember what I forgot? What did I forget...?
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.content: I should have it written down... I'm sure I know.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.options: Rosmontis, relax...;Rosmontis, slow down.;Rosmontis, why don't we take a little nap?
If it hurts, we can go back to Rhodes Island, right now.;Sometimes, you can turn down invitations.

attributes.content: I think I should stay.
attributes.name: Rosmontis

attributes.options: Control your power. Don't force yourself to think. Okay?

attributes.content: Me too!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Do you have the data I need?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: We have little time to spare, but these should help.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: The Energy Section's project and construction plans and reports from the past ten years, Energy and Originium Art Sections' experiment records...
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: The Scientific Investigation Section's expedition reports and data archives.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: It's a lot thicker than I imagined.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Their position within Rhine Lab is rather unique.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: From the corporative perspectives of cost performance and efficiency, their contributions to the company are negligible. They shouldn't even be one of Rhine's ten sections.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: And even though it doesn't rival what the core laboratories like Energy and Structural get, the budget that Rhine Lab allocates to polar field research and surveying technologies every year is no small amount...
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: In fact, you could say they're throwing huge amounts of money at them.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: They collect and analyze seismic data from the Kazimierzian highlands surrounded by mountains in regular intervals, and have built close to ten scientific research stations in the endless icefields of Sami.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: They frequently travel to Columbia's great lakes, as well as the lowland deserts in the south, for their investigations, and even seek to thoroughly explore the ruins of the abandoned cities in the Bleached Wasteland...
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Only a few know that the dust kicked up by pioneering young Columbia is much older than the sands of Sargon.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: These scientists have not been measuring the boundaries of this world in the spirit of exploration. Rather, they are looking for something.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: These last few pages are all about Trimounts.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Trimounts? Why would Scientific Investigation need to factor in the location of Headquarters...?
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: Every project I've checked so far has an immediate sign-off from Rhine Control.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Kristen...
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: And so, did this farce just happen to take place in Trimounts? Or maybe... it could only happen here...?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I would prefer to see some evidence rather than hear more of your roundabout explanations.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: I have some rough conjectures, but the clues are all a mess, and our present information is inadequate to serve as actual evidence.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Let's take a short break.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: You should go have another chat with Ifrit.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: (Angry howling)
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: Get down, Kal'tsit!
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: How is it? Does it fit?
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: It's a new suit the Originium Art Section developed. I made a few adjustments, and it should fit you okay now.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: And I'm sure you know how to test out the new drone equipment.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Come here. Let me help you put the contacts in.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: Okay.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: That'll do it. Stand up and take a look around.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: Great. You're like a completely different person.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: How are the contacts?
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: I'm not quite used to them yet.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: But it's nice to go without weight on my nose.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: I have to say, you look sharper without your glasses.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: I'm sure your friends will be shocked as soon as they see you.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: I'd rather surprise them another way.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Such as...?
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: Say... my personality.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: You seize the day and work toward that. Don't underestimate what a little makeover can accomplish.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: I'll try my best.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Besides, the lockdown isn't going to end anytime soon. The soldiers stopped you once, and it won't be easy to get around now that they've seen you.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: Get a makeover, and upgrade your equipment while you are at it. Two fowls with one stone.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: Thank you.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: It doesn't look like anyone's been here the last couple days... You came to District 13 for a reason today.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: I actually bought this as a vacation home, but with how busy my workers have been lately, I haven't had much time for rest. HR Director and all.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: I just located a Transmitter from Site 359 near the scene. Are you here to recover it? What does Transmitter have to do with the Triton Factory explosion?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: No, Dorothy wouldn't need a low-level researcher like me if you were already on the case.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Ferdinand is out of the picture, but maybe there are other Sections who want Transmitter for their experiments?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: I also saw Saria there... Just how many Rhine Lab personnel are involved in this?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: You're asking too many questions in one go, Silence.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: And unfortunately, I can't answer them.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: You should be well aware of Rhine Lab's organizational structure. The departments under General Affairs are only responsible for providing support to the Scientific Research Sections.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: Originium Art, Energy, or whatever, Human Resource Investigation has never interfered in any of their research projects... I've never been a researcher myself, after all.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: My mentor told me some stories about you and Control.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Before joining Rhine Lab, you were the most eccentric and yet, the most successful investor in Trimounts.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: You've never attended a single meeting, read a proposal, or listened to a project briefing, but the projects you endorse always miraculously succeed.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: There's no need for you to be attached to a company. On the contrary, he said you might even become a tech pioneer to steer the course of the nation.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: But after Control had one meeting with you, you announced you were joining Rhine Lab the very next day.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: The business world is always brimming with delicately packaged myths and legends.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: The outside world is full of speculation, but at my age, I don't Kristen to promise me anything. I only wanted to stay and watch her patch up a few regrets.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: Some her own, and some mine.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: And well, that girl... I'm not sure where exactly she is now.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: You performed very well at Site 359. You cleaned up after Dorothy, and followed the trail all the way here to recover the Transmitter. Honestly, that's remarkable.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: But the Site 359 Incident ends here, and whatever follows is already beyond the scope of both your responsibilities and abilities. You're done here.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: What if I disagree, Director Jara?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Oh, let's not be rash now, I have no intention of getting in your way.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: I don't understand... You won't tell me the truth, so why are you still helping me?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Do you remember your first day at work?
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: You're so reserved, but you still managed to talk non-stop for half an hour.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: I was only responsible for checking your background and qualifications, you know. While I handled that, Parvis had already scored your employment exam. With high numbers.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: Then why didn't you interrupt me...?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Because you're such an earnest woman, Silence.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: I have a lot of respect for serious scientists, same as Rhine Lab.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: No matter how far Kristen and the go, no matter what Rhine Lab may become... we'll always need young people like you to take over the reins someday. You are Rhine's future.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: As HR Director, my job is to protect our employees as best I can, so I advise you to leave now.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: But if you have to see it all happen with your own eyes to make your preparations and choices, then I won't hold you back either.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: That's all.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: Then, I'll earnestly inform you... that I'm going to continue my investigation.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: The very moment the impact force reaches you, you instinctively take the Feline girl's hand.
Evidently, she mistakes it for you being agitated about something. She relaxes her tightly clenched fists, carries you in her arms, and starts running away.
At the same time, the fiery Savra girl dashes in the other direction, her flames howling.
Leave this to me!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Rosmontis, you protect the Doctor.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: I'll melt all these big metal things with my flames.
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Out of the way, Ifrit.
A shadow steps in front of Ifrit.
A thick wall of calcium crystals unfolds before her in an instant, blocking the power armor's onslaught. A burst of intense clashing fills the room, leaving a low, lingering hum in the air.
Saria!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.options: We don't know what's going on. Let it go.

attributes.content: Doctor, are you hurt?
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: All the data are destroyed.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: A distraction and then immediate retreat. The enemy had a clear objective.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: There aren't many who know about this hideout.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: And there are even fewer who would stand against us.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: It was Rhine Lab's mass-produced remote armors that carried out this attack.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: Is it someone from Rhine Lab, then?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: That's not for certain. The military has already infiltrated Rhine Lab, and decisively eliminating unknown factors in their plans is more their style.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: Anyway, you seem to be on the right track. There are people who wish for us to not go any deeper into this.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: Or perhaps, we've been going the wrong way, and someone is trying to get us to continue our investigation.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: What is certain, at the very least, is that we have hit a critical point somewhere.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: And no matter who they are, the people behind this will pay the price.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: You're angry, Saria.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Don't let anger cloud your judgement.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: If Kristen has already solved her energy troubles and cut ties with the military, then we must hurry and find the energy core she's relying on.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: It shouldn't be too far from the S.H.A.F.T. under military control.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I already have a few conjectures based on my recent findings. I'll try to look for it, but I require more information.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I need to head back to Rhine.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: I'll go with you, Saria!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: Don't be silly. I can't watch you right now.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: If you're here and you can't leave Trimounts for the time being, you should spend this time with the Doctor. Don't go anywhere.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: But the bad guys came to our doorstep looking for trouble... Besides, I helped the Doctor!
attributes.name: Ifrit

attributes.content: You should—
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: No... You did great.
attributes.name: Saria

attributes.content: Be extra careful when I'm not around. Take care of the Doctor, and don't let yourself get hurt.
attributes.name: Saria
